eXo Platform 3.0 is comprised of eXo Core and Extended Services. eXo Core Services, which integrates the GateIn portal framework with eXo Content, eXo IDE and other tools, provides all the functionality expected of a portal, but enhanced with enterprise content management, gadget-based development and deployment with an IDE as a service.&nbsp; eXo Extended Services further enhance eXo Platform with user experience functionality, including eXo Collaboration, eXo Knowledge and eXo Social.

This guide will introduce developers to the eXo architecture and guide them through the most common tasks they will need to face when working with eXo. It is a good entry point to the Reference Guide which provides complete overview of eXo Platform 3.0.
